text: BMX Bandits is a 1983 Australian American action adventure comedy movie directed by Brian Trenchard-Smith and starring Nicole Kidman (in her debut), Bryan Marshall, David Argue, Angelo D'Angelo. It was distributed by Filmways Australasian Distributors. ==Other websites== * * *BMX Bandits at Oz Movies * Category:1983 action movies Category:1983 adventure movies Category:1983 comedy movies Category:Australian action movies Category:Australian adventure movies Category:Australian comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Movies directed by Brian Trenchard- Smith
title: BMX Bandits (movie)
